column4: i am runni9ng ubuntu on an olc computer dell demension 4600 with a pemtium 4 and it says my hard disk is failing
my computer is also very slow
can someone help me?
i am runni9ng ubuntu on an olc computer dell demension 4600 with a pemtium 4 and it says my hard disk is failing
yes i know.......... i expect you to help me solve it
my friend doesent have a hard drive he runs ubuntu from his dickdrive
yes i know i need a new one....
dickdrive?
So what do you need us to help you with?
No. Unless you want to store all your data discs and swap them out all the time.
i need some way to make my computer work without useing a hard drive
then could you help me turn my other computer into a linux
its already a puppy linux but i cant get uvb=buntu on it
Just buy a new hard drive for your laptop and replace the failing drive...
and besides im not looking to spend money thats not what i want
What errors do you get when attempting to install Ubuntu on your other system?
what do you mean "couldn't do it"? Did you get errors, failure to boot, or what?
are you sure the image you downloaded was correct and your burn to disc/USB drive was correct?
i used it to install it on this computer
was it burned to a disc or is it an image on a USB drive?
what GPU do you have on the other system?
gpu?
graphics card. Did you buy your computer prebuilt? Do you have a model name for it?
i have a ubuntu cd in it right now ready to boot imma try it
